How to play: 
 
 Each player will click on their deck (left reverse card) to show the first card of it, which will be showing in the middle of each side. 
 
 Once both player have played their cards, the winner of the round will show and the next will begin.The game will continue until both decks are empty. The winner of the game will show and the game can be restarted. 
 
 Enjoy and have fun!
